excerpt: "When will the system run autonomously and are futuristic, higher-capacity vehicles still in the works? Good news, both of those are still on the docket. Earlier this month, Boring opened the first offshoot from its underground people mover at the Las Vegas Convention Center with a link to a station at nearby Resorts World."
